content.text:
# List of War of 1812 Bicentennial

The War of 1812 Bicentennial were a series of events to commemorate the War of 1812 in  Canada  and the United States during the war's bicentenary, 2012â€“2015. Included here is a list of planned commemorations and organizations.
Canada
The Canadian Government marked the bicentennial as a national event.
*[http://1812.gc.ca/eng/1305654894724/1305655293741/ Canadian Heritage]
Provincial commemorations
Ontario
*[http://www.visit1812.com/ Niagara 1812 Legacy Council]
*[http://www.ontariohistoricalsociety.ca/index.php/education-publications/war-of-1812 Ontario Historical Society]
New Brunswick
*[http://www.gnb.ca/1812/ New Brunswick Provincial Committee for Commemorations of War of 1812]
United States
The U.S. government has had no formal organization or committee to coordinate commemorations of the War of 1812; the War of 1812 Bicentennial Commission Act failed to pass Congress in 2006.
U.S. military commemorations
*[http://ourflagwasstillthere.org  U.S. Navy Commemoration of the Bicentennial of the War of 1812 and the Star-Spangled Banner]
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20130426205221/http://www.history.navy.mil/Special%20Highlights/1812/index.html  Naval History and Heritage Command]
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20110811083513/http://fgs.org/1812/ Preserve the Pensions!] (A project to digitize all of the War of 1812 pension files by the end of the war's bicentennial)
Illinois
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20100803162336/http://illinoiswarof1812bicentennial.org/ Illinois War of 1812 Bicentennial Commission]
*[http://illinois1812warsociety.org/ Illinois War of 1812 Society]
Indiana
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20090716153316/http://www.spiritofvincennes.org/1812/commission.html Vincennes War of 1812 Bicentennial Commission]
Iowa
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20101022031513/http://www.fortmadison-ia.com/oldfort.htm Planned commemorations] at the old Fort Madison site.
Kentucky
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20101108035634/http://kynghistory.ky.gov/history/1qtr/addinfo/1812biceninfo.htm Kentucky War of 1812 Bicentennial Commission]
Louisiana
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20150204151710/http://www.battleofneworleans2015.com/index.php Commemoration of the 200th anniversary of the Battle of New Orleans]  (January 8, 2015)
Maryland
*[http://www.msa.md.gov/msa/mdmanual/26excom/html/35war1812.html Maryland War of 1812 Bicentennial Commission]
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20101102011140/http://starspangled200.org/Pages/Home.aspx Maryland's Star Spangled 200 Celebration]
Michigan
*[http://www.michigan.gov/dnr/0,4570,7-153-10369_59572---,00.html The Michigan Commission on the Commemoration of the Bicentennial of the War of 1812]
New York
In 2011, New York state Gov. Andrew Cuomo vetoed a bill to establish a formal War Of 1812 Bicentennial Commission. Previous versions of the bill were vetoed repeatedly by Gov. David Paterson in 2009 and 2010.
North Carolina
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20110125164625/http://nc1812.ncdcr.gov/ North Carolina War of 1812 Bicentennial]
Ohio
*[http://archives.legislature.state.oh.us/bills.cfm?ID=128_SB_93 Ohio War of 1812 Bicentennial Commission]
Virginia
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20100828123542/http://www.jmu.edu/madison/center/page19.html James Madison Center War of 1812 Bicentennial]
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20100609154746/http://dls.state.va.us/1812.htm Virginia Bicentennial of the War of 1812 Commission]
Washington, D.C.
*[http://www.washingtondcwarof1812bicentennialcommission.org/ Washington DC War of 1812 Bicentennial Commission "Building Heritage Bridges"]
References
External links
* [https://web.archive.org/web/20111002175848/http://www.pbs.org/wned/war-of-1812/the-film/watch-film-and-bonus-features/ Online PBS film and shorts on the War of 1812 from WNED]
